content: Are you looking for a custom discord bot with a personalized touch?Look no further! I offer the creation of a chatGPT discord bot with a personality of your choosing. Whether you want a sassy, funny, or professional tone for your bot, I can bring it to life. My Discord bot development service includes prompt customization, as well as testing and debugging to ensure smooth operation. With my expertise in chatGPT and bot development, you can trust that your bot will be in capable hands. Don't hesitate to reach out with any questions or to discuss your project in further detail. I look forward to working with you!-edit ^gpt generated content up there if it wasn't obvious, I'm sorry.low fee models on curie or Davinci  40 request have costed about $0.07 on openAIIf your new they give $18 in credit.My CC is tied to the demonstration model or otherwise I would post a public invite.Heavily updated, no longer on davinci.Free model. Fine tune by prompting.Calculates.here is a testing channel for bitcointalk.org users only.https://discord.gg/G7Ve9pkZt6If you decide you want the bot on your server PM me here.commands are as follows:/chat/private/public/help/reset
